title: 6 Days Tanzania Lodge & Luxury Tented Camp Safari
metaTitle: 6 Days Luxury Tanzania Safari | Serengeti & Ngorongoro
metaDescription: Luxury 6-day safari covering Tarangire, Lake Manyara, Serengeti, and Ngorongoro Crater. Lodge and luxury tented camp accommodation.
overview: Experience Tanzania's finest wildlife destinations in style with luxury lodge and tented camp accommodation. Visit Tarangire's elephant herds, Lake Manyara's tree-climbing lions, the endless Serengeti plains, and the wildlife-packed Ngorongoro Crater.

title: 3 Days Tanzania Lodge Safari
metaTitle: 3 Days Lodge Safari Tanzania | Tarangire to Ngorongoro
metaDescription: Classic 3-day lodge safari covering Tarangire, Lake Manyara, and Ngorongoro Crater. Comfortable accommodation.
overview: A perfect introduction to Tanzania's Northern Circuit. This 3-day safari covers three diverse ecosystems with comfortable lodge accommodation throughout.

title: 6 Days Budget Camping Safari
metaTitle: 6 Days Budget Safari Tanzania | Camping Adventure
metaDescription: Affordable 6-day camping safari through Tanzania's top parks. Tarangire, Lake Manyara, Serengeti, and Ngorongoro.
overview: Experience the best of Tanzania without breaking the bank. Our budget camping safari takes you through four iconic destinations with comfortable camping under African skies.

title: 7 Days Tanzania Tented Camp Safari
metaDescription: Week-long safari with comfortable tented camp accommodation. Comprehensive Northern Circuit experience.
overview: A comprehensive week-long safari through Tanzania's Northern Circuit. Comfortable tented camp accommodation offers the perfect balance between adventure and comfort.

title: 5 Days Tanzania Luxury Safari
metaTitle: 5 Days Luxury Safari Tanzania | Premium Experience
metaDescription: Premium 5-day luxury safari with high-end lodges. Lake Manyara, Serengeti, and Ngorongoro Crater.
overview: Experience Tanzania's highlights in premium style. This 5-day luxury safari offers the best lodges, exclusive game drives, and personalized service.

title: 3 Days Budget Camping Safari
metaTitle: 3 Days Budget Safari Tanzania | Affordable Adventure
metaDescription: Most affordable 3-day safari in Tanzania. Camping in Tarangire, Lake Manyara, and Ngorongoro.
overview: Our most affordable safari option. Experience three incredible parks with camping under the stars. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers.

title: 6 Days Safari to Tarangire, Ngorongoro & Serengeti
metaDescription: Comprehensive 6-day safari covering Tarangire, Ngorongoro, and Serengeti. Central and North Serengeti.
overview: A comprehensive Northern Circuit safari exploring both Central and North Serengeti, plus Tarangire's elephants and Ngorongoro Crater.

title: 8 Days Wonders of Tanzania Safari
metaDescription: Ultimate 8-day safari covering all of Tanzania's wildlife wonders. Comprehensive Northern Circuit.
overview: The ultimate Tanzania safari experience. Eight days exploring all major parks with ample time for wildlife viewing and photography.

title: 4 Days Safari to Ngorongoro and Serengeti
metaDescription: Four-day safari to Tanzania's two most famous destinations. Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater.
overview: Focus on Tanzania's two premier destinations - the endless Serengeti and the wildlife-packed Ngorongoro Crater.

title: 4 Day Safari Adventure in Tanzania
metaDescription: Action-packed 4-day safari adventure through Tanzania's Northern Circuit.
overview: An action-packed safari adventure perfect for those with limited time. Experience the highlights of Tanzania's wildlife in four exciting days.

title: 9 Days Tanzania Wildlife Safari
metaTitle: 9 Days Wildlife Safari Tanzania | Extended Adventure
metaDescription: Extended 9-day wildlife safari for serious wildlife enthusiasts. Comprehensive Tanzania experience.
overview: Our most comprehensive safari for wildlife enthusiasts. Nine days of incredible wildlife encounters across Tanzania's finest parks.

title: 6 Days Tanzania Migration Safari
metaDescription: Witness the Great Migration in the Ndutu area. 6-day safari including calving season viewing.
overview: A specialized migration safari focusing on the Ndutu area during calving season. Witness thousands of wildebeest giving birth on the short-grass plains.

title: 2 Days Tanzania Lodge Safari
metaDescription: Quick 2-day safari perfect for layovers or short stays. Lodge accommodation included.
overview: A quick but rewarding safari experience. Perfect for those with limited time or looking to add wildlife to their Kilimanjaro trip.

title: 5 Days Budget Camping Safari
metaDescription: Affordable 5-day camping safari to Lake Manyara, Serengeti, and Ngorongoro Crater.
overview: Five days of incredible wildlife viewing at budget-friendly prices. Camping safari through three iconic parks.

title: Walking Safari & Trekking on Ngorongoro
metaDescription: Unique walking safari on the Ngorongoro Crater rim. Trek with Maasai guides through ancient landscapes.
overview: Experience Ngorongoro on foot with expert Maasai guides. Trek the crater rim, visit Maasai villages, and enjoy unique wildlife encounters.

title: 7 Days Safari to Tanzania Serval Wildlife
metaTitle: 7 Days Tanzania Wildlife Safari | Serval Focus
metaDescription: Seven-day safari with special focus on finding serval cats and other small predators.
overview: A unique safari focusing on serval cats and other often-overlooked small predators, while still enjoying all the big game.

title: 10 Day Adventure: Safari & Zanzibar
metaDescription: Ultimate 10-day combination of Tanzania safari and Zanzibar beach. Wildlife and relaxation.
overview: The ultimate Tanzania experience combining wildlife safari with beach relaxation in Zanzibar. Perfect balance of adventure and rest.
